## Shotgun metagenomic reads from WUSTL

- **Literature:** <u>[Gut microbiome composition may be an indicator of preclinical Alzheimer's disease](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/37315112/)
- **Source:** Washington University in St. Louis
- **BioProject Link:** <u>[PRJNA798058](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/bioproject/?term=PRJNA798058)
- **Description:** Human gut metagenome - 164 cognitively normal individuals, 49 of whom showed biomarker evidence of early preclinical AD.
